‚öôÔ∏è **Adverbs of frequency** indicate how often an action occurs.

üîπ **Frequency scale (100% ‚Üí 0%):**

- **siempre** ‚Üí always (100%)

üîπ **Position in the sentence:**

1Ô∏è‚É£ **Generally AFTER the conjugated verb**
